title: What Threatens American Jews?
sub_head: College students weigh anti-Semitism from the far  and right.
body: Editor’s note: In this Future View, students discuss anti-Semitism. Next week we’ll ask, “Are Asians discriminated against when they apply to America’s premier colleges?” Students should click here to submit opinions of fewer than 250 words before Feb. 1. The best responses will be published that night.
